title: ICE: inherent_associated_types, IOOB, snapshot vec

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: requires-nightly
labels.description: This issue requires a nightly compiler in some way.

body:
### Code ```Rust #![feature(inherent_associated_types)] #![allow(incomplete_features)] struct Choose(T); impl Choose { type Result = Vec; } fn main() { let _: Choose<&str>::Result = vec!["..."]; } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.70.0-nightly (900c35403 2023-03-08) binary: rustc commit-hash: 900c3540378c8422b8087ffa3db60fa6c8abfcad commit-date: 2023-03-08 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.70.0-nightly LLVM version: 15.0.7 ``` ### Error output ``` ```
Backtrace
